content: crochet bookmarks are one of the cutest crochet projects to try out they are practical and often awesomely quick and easy to make crochet bookmarks are a fast fun project that can easily be made in just a half hour or less they make great gifting options you can make a couple of them and sell at craft fairs they are loved by everyone today am sharing the pattern for a easy crochet bookmark with cute circles unlike the regular circle patterns where the circles are made and joined latter with a sewing needle or a slip_stitch here the circles are made in a continuous line by making the first half and then working on the opposite side this crocheted bookmark is easily customizable you can adjust the size of the bookmark by altering the starting number of chains materials used - 8 ply yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 12 inches checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/gifdzfd004m
